item.title: ::HELP::317::how do i place npc's +i dont got autospawn..?::317::HELP::Moved
item.dc:creator: @Editt Editt
item.description:
@Editt wrote:

[Server files > NPCHANDER.java > Search for:

						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;

You see somthing like this:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == ID of the NPC && misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to ......scape";
					}

Copy and paste Change the NPC name and what the npc’s say en do: ::npc (the id) or go to autospawn and copy and paste this:

spawn = The id Coords X Coords Y 0 0 0 0 0 1
And good luck

Read full topic

item.title: ::HELP::317::how do i place npc's +i dont got autospawn..?::317::HELP::Moved
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Coordinates are not in file, that’s in the actual server and it’s not required here.

If I were you, I’d just do what most people do and slap it in NPCHandler’s process().

Read full topic

item.title: ::HELP::317::how do i place npc's +i dont got autospawn..?::317::HELP::Moved
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

For unlocked topics please learn how to ask a question![Updated 9/28/08]

Next, you’ll have to show us what you’ve already done. THIS IS A MUST! If we want to get anywhere as a community, we’re going to have to quit the spoon-feeding. So if you ask something like “how do I get food healing to work” and show us no previous attempts, you’re not going to get an answer. You may be wondering how a question like this is considered bad. Well, the question asker did not make an attempt to solve the problem him or herself, and is indirectly asking the same question as “tell me how to get food healing work so I can continue my effortless server.” So, remember, show us what you’ve done, what you’ve tried to do, or what you think may work.

Tell me what you tried then…?

Read full topic
